* BrightBlade smiled as she got to her feet and stood beside Gangon, he 
always tried to protect her but it really didn't matter to her. She didn't 
need him to protect her, she was flattered but she could look after herself.
BrightBlade stepped in front of him,took Gangon by the shoulders and pushed 
against them, she wanted to give him the hint to step back and lowed his 
weapon.
She smiled at him...*

" You have done enough, you need to rest. Leave this troublesome Maximal to 
me. Please, rest." she winked at him, " For me."

* It was then that she turned towards Tavatron and growled, nobot tried to 
hurt her partner and got away with it!!
BrightBlade picked up her gun again and aimed it at the boulder that 
Tavatron hid behind, with a wild yip she fired at the boulder and watched as 
dust and pebbles fly into the air.
Without warning she ran over and jumped on top of the boulder once the dust 
cleared away, she stared Tavatron straight in the optics and then squatted 
down so that she was almost face to face with her.
She snickered in the Maximals face...*

" Pay-back's a bitch, huh?!"

* It was then that she fired her weapon at point-blank range at Tavatron's 
chest. Pay-back WAS a bitch, for her enemies!*
